list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: sleep lightly or briefly, especially during the day.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she took to napping on the beach in the afternoons
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy đã chụp ngủ trên bãi biển vào buổi chiều

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a horse) refuse, especially habitually, to go on at the rider's instruction; jib.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: horses which nap should be dealt with by professionals
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ngựa ngủ trưa nên được giải quyết bởi các chuyên gia

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a short sleep, especially during the day.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: excuse me, I'll just take a little nap
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Xin lỗi, tôi sẽ ngủ một chút

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the raised hairs, threads, or similar small projections on the surface of fabric or suede (used especially with reference to the direction in which they naturally lie).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: carefully machine the seam, following the direction of the nap
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cẩn thận máy may, theo hướng nap

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a card game resembling whist in which players declare the number of tricks they expect to take, up to five.
